slide.title: EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy
slide.notes: It’s my great pleasure to come here and share a topic which is about EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy to all of you
slide.notesNormalized: it’s my great pleasure to come here and share a topic which is about eus-guided interstitial brachytherapy to all of you
slide.notesHtml: It’s my great pleasure to come here and share a topic which is about EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy to all of you
slide.text: EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy Zhendong Jin, MD Shanghai Changhai hospital China

slide.title: EUS-guided implantation 125I-radioactive seeds
slide.notes: Mostly ,we implant 125I radioactive seeds into target tissue to perform interstitial brachytherapy. Each seed source was 4.5mm in length and 0.8mm in diameter.The seeds had a half−life of radioactivity is 60 days. which can continusely release garmma rays and the penetration distance in human tissue is 1.7cm
slide.notesNormalized: mostly ,we implant 125i radioactive seeds into target tissue to perform interstitial brachytherapy. each seed source was 4.5mm in length and 0.8mm in diameter.the seeds had a half−life of radioactivity is 60 days. which can continusely release garmma rays and the penetration distance in human tissue is 1.7cm
slide.notesHtml: Mostly ,we implant 125I radioactive seeds into target tissue to perform interstitial brachytherapy. Each seed source was 4.5mm in length and 0.8mm in diameter.The seeds had a half−life of radioactivity is 60 days. which can continusely release garmma rays and the penetration distance in human tissue is 1.7cm
slide.text: EUS-guided implantation 125I-radioactive seeds Xinke Pharmaceutical, Ltd, Shanghai Length 4.5 mm Diameter 0.8 mm Half life 60.1 d Initial dose rate 7.7 cGy/hr Penetration distance 1.7cm Time to release 94％radioactivity 240 d

slide.title: EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy
slide.notes: EUS−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds is mostly applied in tumor treatment such as pancreatic cancer and Retroperitoneal metastases, and this procedure can also be used for pain management by performing celiac plexus or ganglia brachytherapy
slide.notesNormalized: eus−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds is mostly applied in tumor treatment such as pancreatic cancer and retroperitoneal metastases, and this procedure can also be used for pain management by performing celiac plexus or ganglia brachytherapy
slide.notesHtml: EUS−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds is mostly applied in tumor treatment such as pancreatic cancer and Retroperitoneal metastases, and this procedure can also be used for pain management by performing celiac plexus or ganglia brachytherapy
slide.text:
Radioactive seeds (brachytherapy) Radioactive seeds (brachytherapy) Radioactive seeds (brachytherapy) EUS-guided implantation for tumor treatment EUS-guided implantation for tumor treatment pancreatic cancer Retroperitoneal metastases EUS-guided implantation for pain control EUS-guided implantation for pain control
Celiac plexus or ganglia brachytherapy EUS-guided interstitial brachytherapy

slide.title: EUS-guided implantation 125I-feasibility
slide.notes: Pro sun firstly evaluated the feasibility and safety of the precedure in 2005,they implanted the radioactive seeds in porcines pancreas, all seeds were successful implanted without significant complication.tissue with the seed (arrow) became rigid and white. Histopathologic section from the center of the treatment shows the necrotic tissue (arrow) and the surrounding fibrotic tissue,

slide.title: EUS-guided implantation 125I-seeds
slide.notes: Before the precedure, we should calculate of the number of seeds needed for Implantation。 The total volume of each tumor was calculated according to the CT image with the treatment planning system (TPS) before implantation
slide.notesNormalized: before the precedure, we should calculate of the number of seeds needed for implantation。 the total volume of each tumor was calculated according to the ct image with the treatment planning system (tps) before implantation
slide.notesHtml: Before the precedure, we should calculate of the number of seeds needed for Implantation。 The total volume of each tumor was calculated according to the CT image with the treatment planning system (TPS) before implantation
slide.text: EUS-guided implantation 125I-seeds volume of tumor was calculated according to the CT image with the treatment planning system (TPS) Determine the total radioactivity for tumor seeds amount and array E U S

slide.text: EUS-guided implantation 125I-seeds Tumor (cm) (mCi) The expected number of implanted seeds was then calculated according to the modified Cevec formula as follows: During operation, to reach maximum radiation effects, the number of seeds implanted was 15 percent more than needed

slide.title: EUS 2006
slide.notes: So we reported this method for tumor treatment for the first time at 15thinternational EUS congress Holded in Holland in 2006
slide.notesNormalized: so we reported this method for tumor treatment for the first time at 15thinternational eus congress holded in holland in 2006
slide.notesHtml: So we reported this method for tumor treatment for the first time at 15thinternational EUS congress Holded in Holland in 2006
slide.text: 15thinternational EUS congress Holland 2006.6 Endoscopic ultrasonography-guided interstitial implantation of iodine 125 seeds combined with chemotherapy in the treatment of unresectable abdominal carcinoma: a prospective study EUS 2006

slide.title: EUS-guided implantation125I for PDAC
slide.notes: Then we evaluated the clinical efficacy and safety of endoscopic ultrasonography (EUS)−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds in 22 patients suffered from advanced pancreatic cancer. EUS−guided interstitial implantation of 125I seeds may represent a safe alternative treatment option for locally advanced pancreatic cancer. Our preliminary data suggest improvement in pain, but no long−term survival benefit.
slide.notesNormalized: then we evaluated the clinical efficacy and safety of endoscopic ultrasonography (eus)−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds in 22 patients suffered from advanced pancreatic cancer. eus−guided interstitial implantation of 125i seeds may represent a safe alternative treatment option for locally advanced pancreatic cancer. our preliminary data suggest improvement in pain, but no long−term survival benefit.
slide.notesHtml: Then we evaluated the clinical efficacy and safety of endoscopic ultrasonography (EUS)−guided interstitial implantation of radioactive seeds in 22 patients suffered from advanced pancreatic cancer. EUS−guided interstitial implantation of 125I seeds may represent a safe alternative treatment option for locally advanced pancreatic cancer. Our preliminary data suggest improvement in pain, but no long−term survival benefit.
slide.text: EUS-guided implantation125I for PDAC Is it effective in clinical practice？ ( Jin et al. 2008) EUS−guided interstitial brachytherapy may represent a safe alternative treatment option for locally advanced pancreatic cancer.

slide.title: how to evaluate the prognosis？
slide.notes: We developed a fuzzy classification method by applying digital image processing in EUS image. And we found this method can be used to make prognosis judgement for patients treated by interstitial brachytherapy.
slide.notesNormalized: we developed a fuzzy classification method by applying digital image processing in eus image. and we found this method can be used to make prognosis judgement for patients treated by interstitial brachytherapy.
slide.notesHtml: We developed a fuzzy classification method by applying digital image processing in EUS image. And we found this method can be used to make prognosis judgement for patients treated by interstitial brachytherapy.
slide.text: how to evaluate the prognosis？ EUS-guided implantation125I for PDAC digital image processing (DIP) (Xu, Jin et al. WJG 2013)

slide.title: EUS-guided interstitial chemoradiation
slide.notes: HOW about of EUS guided interstitial chemoradiation? Pro. Sun enrolled 8 patients suffered from advanced pancreatic cancer .All these patients received 16 radioactive seeds and 32 intratumoral implants which can sustained delivery of 5-fluorouracil
slide.notesNormalized: how about of eus guided interstitial chemoradiation? pro. sun enrolled 8 patients suffered from advanced pancreatic cancer .all these patients received 16 radioactive seeds and 32 intratumoral implants which can sustained delivery of 5-fluorouracil

slide.title: EUS-guided Celiac Plexus Brachytherapy --Is EUS-CPR be feasible？
slide.titleNormalized: eus-guided celiac plexus brachytherapy --is eus-cpr be feasible？
slide.notes: Interstitial brachytherapy also can be applyed for pain control, we called celiac plexus brachytherapy or CPR

slide.text: EUS-guided Celiac Plexus Brachytherapy --Is EUS-CPR be feasible？

slide.title: EUS-CGR
slide.notes: As more than 80% celiac ganglia can be visualized or identified by EUS. So we performed EUS-CGR
slide.notesNormalized: as more than 80% celiac ganglia can be visualized or identified by eus. so we performed eus-cgr
slide.notesHtml: As more than 80% celiac ganglia can be visualized or identified by EUS. So we performed EUS-CGR
slide.text: EUS-CGR

slide.title: EUS-CGR
slide.notes: We enrolled 23 patients who had moderate to severe pain resulting from biopsy proven unresectable pc
slide.notesNormalized: we enrolled 23 patients who had moderate to severe pain resulting from biopsy proven unresectable pc
slide.notesHtml: We enrolled 23 patients who had moderate to severe pain resulting from biopsy proven unresectable pc
slide.text: EUS-CGR (Wang, Jin et al.GIE 2012)

slide.title: EUS-CGR
slide.notes: The mean number of seeds implanted in the celiac ganglion per patient was 4 Two weeks after the procedure, the Visual Analog Scale score and mean analgesic consumption were significantly decreased. No procedure-related deaths or major complications occurred. Randomized, prospective, controlled, and comparative clinical trials are needed to confirm the safety and long-term effectiveness of this new approach to pain management
slide.notesNormalized: the mean number of seeds implanted in the celiac ganglion per patient was 4 two weeks after the procedure, the visual analog scale score and mean analgesic consumption were significantly decreased. no procedure-related deaths or major complications occurred. randomized, prospective, controlled, and comparative clinical trials are needed to confirm the safety and long-term effectiveness of this new approach to pain management
slide.notesHtml: The mean number of seeds implanted in the celiac ganglion per patient was 4 Two weeks after the procedure, the Visual Analog Scale score and mean analgesic consumption were significantly decreased. No procedure-related deaths or major complications occurred. Randomized, prospective, controlled, and comparative clinical trials are needed to confirm the safety and long-term effectiveness of this new approach to pain management
slide.text: EUS-CGR (Wang, Jin et al.GIE 2012) EUS-guided celiac ganglion irradiation with 125I seeds is safe, feasible, and effective

slide.title: Conclusion
slide.text: Conclusion EUS-guided intersititial brachytherapy for tumor treatment is a feasible, safely procedure ,obtain moderate local anti-tumor effect EUS-guided celiac ganglion irradiation with 125I seeds is safe, feasible, and effective
